summary: Removes the radial blur and blue tint from Khajiit\'s NightEye while keeping the brightness
descriptionHtml:
This is a simple modification that all Khajiits should enjoy. What it does is keep the same level of brightness enhancement of the ability while removing the annoying radial blur and blue tint.

To install place the .esp into your game\'s data folder.

To uninstall simply delete the .esp from the game\'s data folder.



Recomended but not mandatory:

Dark Nights and Dungeons by ForthRight - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=3612
author: theEmeraldCat
